data.title: We are excited to announce our outstanding fellowship match!

data.text:
We thank all of our faculty and staff for they do before and during recruitment season. We thank you for your enthusiasm and engagement during interviews, but also mentoring and taking extra time to meet with applicants and answer questions.

A huge thank you to our current fellows who spent so much time highlighting our program and our city, even after hours.

Our heartfelt gratitude also goes out to Stephanie McManus, fellowship coordinator, Stephanie Montgomery, senior administrator and our chief fellow David Olafsson, MD, for all their tireless work making this possible!

We are looking forward to two years (and more for some) with a fantastic fellowship class!

Sincerely,

Ige George, MD, MS

Associate Professor of Medicine

Director, Infectious Diseases Fellowship Program
